choices: Outside the school building, near the front gate
In the middle of the hallway
In the principle's room, whose not there...yet
1.content:
It was early morning and you woke up late. You got dress and got your backpack and ran as fast as you can, while also forgetting to bring you pokemon. You ran as fast as you can until you see the school. The first bell started to rang you panic as you are late.

Once inside the school premise, you were about to head to you first class when you suddenly felt weird. You vision blur and soon you collapse. You look around, things felt...different. You didn't recognize the area you were in until you saw something that shock you, a pencil. The pencil was ordinary for the most part except for one itty bitty thing, its as long as a sckyscrapper. You look around and see what used to be ordinary object the size of either montains or buildings, you shrunk. You try to figure out what happened, this has to be a dream. Unfortantly, it wasn't a dream as you look around and see that you are...
1.title: The start of a big day

11.content:
You saw strange mountians that was nothing kore than either rocks or pebbles, green towers that were just blades of grass. If that wasn't bad enough, you can hear the noise of pokemon wildlife that you normally be tiny to regular people is now loud noise that surrounds you. You need to get help, but you can see just how far it is to get to the school as its what looks like miles and miles away from you.

If you were normal size, you would only need to walk about twenty feet from the gate to the school door. At ant size, you feel like you will be spending weeks just to get to the otherside, and that's only because of the endless forest of grass that stands before you. No matter what, you need to get someone's attention, and fast as already you can feel the ground shake from who knows what. Gathering your courage, you run straight into the grass forest.

About half an hour later and already you are regretting your discion. You thought that maybe you could use the school's massive structure as a guide, but the blades of grass were so much and cover the sky that now you are lost. You can see loght here and there, but you can'st make head or tail of where you are going. You thought of stopping when you felt the ground shaking. You panic as you have no idea what is causing the shaking. Was it a human, a pokemon, who cares as yoy ran as fast as you can to any direction. The shaking grew stronger and stronger as the source of the tremor was starting to get near you. You continue to run when...


*BBBOOOOMMM*

Something slams right in front of you and you slam right into it.you fell on your back as you look to see what you ran into. Whatever it was, it was huge, made of rubber and feels big anough to crush a town in one step You then recognize what the structure is, its a school loafer, which means you ran into a student. You look up to see who is this student that is blissfully unaware of how close she was to step on you. You squint you're eyes and see that the student is....
11.title: The great big outdoor

choices: She takes another step and flings you off, now you're in her way.
Stops as she makes it to the room and gets to her desk.
Takes a step and catapults you somewhere on her.
113.content:
Looking up, you see a pale tower that must be the students leg. You then look higher up before blushing as you realize that you are looking upskirt to see spiderweb design underwear. Shaking your head and looking higher up, you see long purple hair until you see the face of the student. You don't remember seeing this student before so you have know idea who she is, which also mean she wouldn't recognize you even if she spots you up close.

As you were distracted a bit from trying to look at the hex maniac's face, you felt a rumble and remember that this girl is walking is about to leave you behind. You need to get someone's attention so you might as well get this stranger's attention. You ran to her shoe and grab on just in time for her to lift her foot.

The mere momentum was just awful to you as you felt like you were on a massive pandulum that stops abrutly follow by a massive tremor that threatens to shake you off. And that was with the first step, and she would be walking for about ten minutes. It seems this girl is looking around the hallway. Either she just transfer her, or she doesn't know where her classroom is exactly. That part didn't matter to you as you struggle to hang on to the loafer, your grip is starting to slip.

High above, you heard a loud mumble as this girl seems to find her classroom and starts to pick up pace, much to your dismay. The sudden shift in speed was starting to get too much as your grip starts loosen just as....
113.title: Gothic mountain above

choices: You only made it to her knee and have to hang on
You made it to her skirt
She started to move and you started to fall towards her backpack
1132.content:
You lost your grip as the girl takes another step. You land on the groun and was expecting to for the student to continue walking...only she didn't. Looking up, it turns out that she made it to her class and was getting to her desk.

As you look up and wonder how are you ever going to get this girl's attention. You heard the teacher of this class calling out name. "Blue....Lisa....Crystal...." The teacher calls out bames with the following students responding back until finally... "And I think that's...oh right, students, we have a new student, Vivian?" Everyone looks around until...

"...Here..." The voice, while sounding like whisper, echoes down on you as you look up at the student. At least you know her name now. As the teacher continues to talk to the students before finally lecturing, you decide to focus on climbing the student while she isn't moving. Unfortantly, looking at the scyscrapper long legs, you have a long climb.

Gathering you strength, you first climb the building size loafer in front of you. It didn't take you long to get to the top. You then spend a few minutes to cross the top of the shoe until finally you made it to her ankle. You then start your climb on the tall pale leg. It was a painful struggle for you as the student's leg is very smooth and hard to get a grip on. You hope you make it to the top before she starts moving. After an hour and the bell started to ring...
1132.title: Made it just in time

115.content: So who,is it going to be?
115.title: Someone else

choices: Taking you to the principal's office
Take you with her to class
Take her with you to class (and hide you)
1151.content:
(Just a quick note, the owner of this interactive has allowed me use the actual Max from pokemon)

Uyou looked up and were shocked to see your big sister May. You called up to her yelling as loduly as you can. Mwy looked down and was shocked to see you, her genius seven year old brother shrunken down to doll bug size. "Max! I've been looking all over flr you, I was worried sick. What happened?" May asked as she reached down to pick you up. You blushed and were embarrassed and told her that you didn't know.

May hums and bites her lip before deciding on...
1151.title: May

12.content: The hallway was easily to make out with it's narrow design. You see posters that looks familar, and even doors that felt like only mountainous size beings can open. You shiver a bit as you realize that you are in the middle of the hallway, probably one of the worst place for you to be at the moment at your size. As soon as the school bell rings, you know every student will be walking through this area and you will have next to no chance of surviving. Without thinking where to go exactly, you ran to one side of the hallway which turns out to be where a bunch of school locker is at. You were about a foot away, for a normal size person, from the locker when you hear the bell ran. As you feared, people start to pour out of the classroom and began to walk around the hallway as you thought. Already dozens of massive footwear stomps behind you and you had to jump to avoid being step on. You were close to be under the locker, you just need to move a other inch. However, you see a shadow forming around you and you look up to see that someone's foot is right above you. With one last ounce of your strength, you jump forward jusy in time to avoid the foot from crushing you. You look around see that you are under the locker, so you're safe for the time being. As you try to catch your breath, you notice that the foot that almost crush you isn't moving, which means this must be thr owner of the locker above you. Cautiously, you look above to see whose the owner of the locker. As it turns out, the owner of the locker that almost step on you is...
12.title: In the worst area to be ant size

choices: She stumbles, causing you to fall somewhere ...
She bends down to tie her laces ...
She looks at a very small "bug" on top of her shoe ...
122.content:
You can see, with your diminutive view, a huge blond girl with green eyes, she wears the school uniform (School loafers, black knee stockings, black skirt and white shirt)

While you looked at her really huge shoe, you could see the difference in size between you and she, her loafer was much bigger than your house which made you feel really insignificant compared to her ...

Before you continued to "watch" her, she was about to leave after taking several things from her locker, knowing that this was a good opportunity you jumped grabbing one of her shoe laces

However for your bad luck, she...
122.title: Bianca!

choices: Go to look for her friend(s)
She's off to do some poke battles with her classmates
1222.content:
You jumped to the shoe lace, and brace yourself, expecting the massive student to walk. She did move her foot a little, but that was it for a moment. Confused, you look to see why, just in time for the area to grew dark as something is coming towards you. You look up and saw her massive finger reaching towards, except, she is actually reaching for her shoe lace. As turns out, her shoe is loose and she bends down to tie it before walking.

You felt you body being crush as her finger pinch you down just so she could lift the shoe lace. Then you felt yourself being moved around none stop until finally after a minute the finger lets go...only for something to pin you down. You look around and saw that the student unknowingly tied you down to her shoe just as she finish tieing it down. You then felt everything shake as the students stands back up and started to walk. It felt a rollarcoaster as you would go up then down as this mountain of a student takes a step. You were glad you don't have to worry about being fling off when this girl takes a step, but at the same time you are practically trap until she stops moving and have to wiggle yourself free.

As for the student herself, Bianca hums to herself as she....
1222.title: Tie down

13.content:
The smell of floor wax and sport equipment, distant mountain ranges that are nothing more than benches. There's no doubt, you are in the school gym, the biggest area of the whole school. It houses a pool one section, weight equipment and punching bags in one section, and a section that can serve either for basketball, dodgeball and even track if the weather is bad outside. This is bad for you as the gym is has large amount of classmates. Already you can feel and hear the thunderous noise of classmate that are in their class. The way things are, you are in the center of the gym, which mean its easy for any student to walk over to you and accidently crush you without looking.

And unfortantly for you, that seems to be the case as a student can be seen walking towards your direction, unaware that she is about to be on top of you. The girl in question is...
13.title: Gym is intimidiating enough at normal size...

131.content:
You watch from the distant as a massive girl with orange hair in a swimsuit is walking towards your direction. Even though you never talk to her, you knew she is the best swimmer of the school, Misty. Unfortantly, you also know she is also know to hate bugs. Which means she easily the most dangerous girl to try to get the attention of.

Sadly, you need someone's help and right now she is the closest person that you can get near. Provided you don't get crush first as Misty is walking closer and closer.

Each step she took made the ground shake, making it difficult for you to even get out of Misty's path. Soon enough, the blissfully unaware swimmer contines to walk as she is now right on top of you. You look up and the sole of her feet hovering high above you before slowly descending. You close your eyes as Misty...

Was about to begin her training routine ...

You could see a brown haired girl with blue eyes, she wears the sports uniform (White sneakers, white socks, blue shorts and white shirt)

While she was walking towards your direction, you were really surprised by her really colossal size, she could crush you with her sneaker too easily ...

She stopped a few inches near you, you were not realizing that she ...

Everything looks like a blurry mountain at first but starts to look familar. You then remember that you were running late and ran to your classroom, which for some reason was empty when you enter. But lookimg around, you recognize the classroom as its was...
14.title: In a classroom

141.content:
You remembered that it was the math classroom, in the distance you could see on the walls some posters that were related to the mathematical operations, next to you there was a huge sheet of paper with math problems written in it, yes, it was the math classroom

There was no student or teacher in the classroom, it was really strange, but at any time somebody had to arrive

Suddenly, you heard a great rumble in the distance, the rumble was turning into an earthquake, in the distance you could see with surprise and a bit of fear, a giant girl, she is...
141.title: Math classroom

142.content:
The strong smell of chemicals and the sight of massive tall tables confirm where you are at, a science classroom, more specifically, the lab part of the classroom. You look around to see if anyone is here, but so far no student or teacher is here.

Thinking that being on the ground is too dangerous and maybe you can get someone's attention if you climb the table next to you, you start your increadibly difficult climb.

After what felt like forever of nonstop climbing, you finally made it to the top of this table. Exhuasted, you decide to relax a bit before trying to think of how in the world you are going to get anyone's attention.

Sadly, you don't have the opportunity as you felt a small tremor. You look around and knew that this must mean the someone is coming. And you are right as someone came inside the classroom just as the school bell rang, signaly class will be beginning. You see the silhoutte of the person coming towards your direction. You gulp a bit as the person walks until she stops near the table, with her form standing above you. You look up to see the face of this massive person and see that its....

143.title: Poke history classroom

choices: One of the best friends you've ever had. (Sun/Elio route) *Reserved for Author
One of the best friends you've ever had. (Selene/Moon route)
Someone you had a massive crush on. (Random Nobody route)
1432.content:
Blonde hair, big hat, white dress? Yep, that's Lillie alright. She seems to be absorbed in her studies at the moment, as she usually is. Luckily for you, the strap of her bag hangs low enough for you to climb up to her chair, then you can use her long hair to make it to her desk. As you begin to climb, you start to think about how lucky you were to find Lillie before she left the school for the day, after all, she usually has to stay over later than most as her mother can't get to the school in time to pick her up when school ends. Fortunately Lusamine has a lot a sway with the school, what with her having donated a lot of money towards it, so Lillie is allowed to stay in classrooms and continue studying after school.

Once you reach her seat, you look up at her face, her green eyes are reading whatever book she has up there intensely, now that her and her mother are on good terms she can focus more on her true passion, Pokemon. she made it her life's goal to study and understand every Pokemon in the world, so the majority of her time is spent studying to be a Pokemon researcher. Honestly, you couldn't have picked a better person to get help from, she's kind, smart, and most importantly.....
1432.title: Lillie

1433.content:
You tried to see any one else who could help you. Upon investigating the desks, you were able to make out the other two girls. There was Erika and then there was Jasmine. Maybe one of them could help you?You know that both of them have kind hearts, so you knew they would be able to help you. Before you even took one step, you felt the ground rumbles below you, becoming more violent with each step. Suddenly, the door opens, to reveal it was your history teacher, Drasna. She wore a reddish brown dress, accessorized with fangs. Even her shoes had fangs. She appeared to be oblivious to your presence as she headed towards you. You couldn't move, you were frozen still. You watched as Drasna's massive heel came crashing towards you. However, it missed you and only the heel's shank was on top of you.

Drasna continued to walk towards her desk. She explains to the class that a test is today and she will be handing out the tests and that they have until the bell to finish. She handed out the tests to the class and walked back to her desk. You new Drasna for a while now. She was very kind to you and her class and was always willing to help anyone with a question? Probably she could be able to help as well.

You decided to...
1433.title: Saved by a heel.

144.content:
You knew you were in the language classroom, it's the least decorated and colorful classroom of all the school

Taking advantage of the fact that there were no students in the classroom, you decided to climb one of the chairs near you, so you could try to get the attention of the person who uses that seat

You started climbing one of the legs of the chair, it was slippery, but after a few minutes, you managed to get to the seat

You lay down to rest from your tired climb, until you ended up almost asleep ...

A few minutes later a huge earthquake wake you up, when you open your eyes, you saw a really huge girl silhouette walking towards the seat!

Looking at the huge silhouette with attention, you realized that she is ...

15.content: You look around and see massive furnitures and stuff, but you recognize the funiture as it all belong to the proncipal of the school. You look around to try to find the principal but can't find her. At this size, you wonder if the principal can even see you as you're nothing more than a mere ant to everyone. As you were about to walk and look around, you felt a tremor. The world shake and you at first thought the school is suffering a earthquake until you rememver that you shrunk. The shaking was getting stronger and stronger, it can only mean one thing, the principal was returning to her room. Her voice could be heard behind you as she seems to talking to someone. You look behind you as you see a massive door, waiting for the principal to come in. Soon the shaking stops, only you to see the doorknob fo the door starting to rotate. You watch in fear as the door opens and walks in Principal....
15.title: Bad time to be in the Principal's room

152.content: Principal Cynthia walked into her office with a black lunch bag. You knew she'ed never eat in the teacher's lounge as she's usually busy with making sure the the school is up to date. Cynthia sat down at her desk and began eating her lunch. You always thought she was cute, hoping that when the school year ends, you could ask her out. One things for certain, you needed her help. Cynthia's leg was visible from where you were. You could probably try to stimulate some reaction for her to notice you. Her desk looked like it's claimable and probably she could see you. Or you could go into the teacher's lounge. Probably the other teachers could help you.
152.title: Cynthia

choices: Run to the principal herself and climb her
Go to her desk and climb on top of it
Try to find something on the floor that will make Lusamine examine.
154.content:
Time felt slow as you watch in fear as Principal Lusamine steps into the room. Her heels lands on the floor, from soft click were now booming explosions as she shakes the world around you. You watch Lusamine closing the door behind her and proceed to make her way to her desk, which unfortuantly walking right towards you as you are in her way. You try at first to shout out to you principal to notice you, but after the first few steps, you realizes that she can't hear you from down here and you need to run immediatly. Each steps she takes grew stronger as she gets closer to you, casting a shadow that engulf you very quickly as you struggle to run from her path. The tiniest step Lusamine makes shook the ground violently that you struggle to keep any footing until one step cause you to trip and land on your stomach.

You try to get up until you look up and watch in horror as the bottom sole of her heel can be seen hovering right above you. Her shoe starts to decend as Lusamine takes another step, unaware that you are beneath her. With no time to get up and run, you close your eyes and wait for what comes next.

A powerful loud thunderous boom erupts your eardrum, but to your surprise, you found yourself to be somewhat ok. You look around and see a massive wall standing next to you. Looking up, you could easily tell that you are staring at the bottom sole of your principal shoe. By some extreme amount of dumb luck, your principal missed you by a milimeter or two. Soon you felt another tremor before the ground around you rumble, and the sole started to lift. You back away to avoid getting ram by Lusamine's foot as she continues to walk. You watch Lusamine walking a few more steps before reaching her desk. You watch her get behind it before sitting down and grabbing some paperwork.

While you want to take this as a time to catch your breath to comprehend everything that just happen, you know you need to do something to get either Principal Lusamine or someone's attention. Getting up and collecting yourself, you know Lusamine is the closes person that you can get her attention at the moment, but the biggest problem is to get her attention somehow. Being on the floor isn't going to help, and her head is so far away. Nonetheless, you need to think of something and fast before Lusamine decides to get up and walk again. After some thought, you decide to...
154.title: In the presence of the principal

info.brief_description: Its time for pokemon high school, but something strange happens to you, you shrunk.
info.description:
Your name is Max, it was another day at a pokemon high school. Classmates were minding their business and teachers were of course teaching. As for you, you were a normal student attending somewhere at school when something happened to you. You shrunk and is now the size of a ant.

What happened, what cause you to shrink? Did a experiment cause this, a pokemon, magic or stone? Who knows, and its up to you to figure it out to get back to normal. Unfortantly, nobody saw you when you shrunk, as such, you are on your own as you struggle to survive. Will you be discover and get help, or will you be treated as a bug among the girls of school? Good luck.


Rules:
This is mostly a giantess interactive so please keep the giant female. You can involve giant male, but keep it extremely brief. As for the giantess, all females from the pokemon universe is allowed, games, manga, shows, if they're female, they are allowed to be in the story. Just make sure that they fit roles based on their appearance/ age. Example: Characters like the hex manaics, Bianca, and May look like students and should stick to that role innsomenways. While characters like Cynthia or Diana are adults so they should be teachers or principal. Every character can either appear in their regular outfit, or they can appear in school uniform, just make sure to establish which. Pokemons can be allowed in, but they are strictly in their regular pokemon forms, no exception. Also, since NPCs don't really have one single name, just pick a name for a npc and stick with it.

As for you, you are stuck as ant size, you can't grow any bigger unless you want to end the interactive. You can shrink more, but make sure to find what shrunk you in the first place. It can be anything, from a science experiment to even someone having magic.Also, keep the things in 2nd pov, meaing that you say "You did..." or "You ran..." no 3rd or first part.

Nothing disgusting like scat or pee are allowed, no worship of any kind are allowed. And please make sure you focus on something else instead of one thing.

Also, the giantess are to stay unaware of you for the most part until you actually catch their attention.

Another thing, please be descriptive in the chapters with clear grammer. No one sentence chapters, chapters have to be at least a paragraph long.

Other than that, feel free to do whatever you want. You can explore areas, people or get into situations that will lead to your death, feel free to what you want or think is best.
